ResourceHeader.Description: The Davis Ionosonde station in Davis, Antarctica, has Ionosondes since February 1985. They are IPS 4D between 06/1994, IPS 5D between 02/2000 and 12/2001 and Lowell digisonde since December 2001 to now. No ionosnde information before 06/1994 is available. The Lowell Digisonde-Portable-Sounder-4D (DPS4D) vertical sounding ionosondes normally sweep in frequency from about 0.5 to 30 MHz. Frequency step is selectable to 1kHz. The step interval is variable, becoming more coarse at higher frequencies as ionograms are generally displayed on a logarithmic scale. See details at http://www.sws.bom.gov.au/World_Data_Centre/2/1/22
